meanings.definition: The action of revising or making changes to something.
meanings.sent1: She made several revisions to her essay before submitting it.
meanings.sent2: The revisions to the report improved its clarity and accuracy.
meanings.sent3: The revisions to the recipe turned out to be a disaster, as she accidentally added salt instead of sugar.
meanings.sent4: His revisions to the painting transformed it from dull to vibrant, like a butterfly emerging from a cocoon.
meanings.sent5: The revisions to the play brought the characters to life, making the audience laugh and cry.

meanings.definition: A revised version or edition of a document or piece of work.
meanings.sent1: The new revisions of the software fixed the bugs that were causing errors.
meanings.sent2: The publisher released the latest revisions of the textbook with updated information.
meanings.sent3: She proudly displayed the revisions of her novel on the bookshelf, showcasing her hard work.
meanings.sent4: The revisions of the song gave it a fresh sound, like a new coat of paint on an old wall.
meanings.sent5: The revisions of the contract clarified the terms, ensuring both parties understood their obligations.
